title: Web Solutions & Portfolio Website (polished UI/UX with specified background color)

requirements.text: Create a responsive single-page portfolio website for a web solutions provider with a polished UI/UX and clear section-based navigation.

quotes: create web solution  & portfolio website with following background color and good looking UI UX :

acceptanceCriteria: A landing page is implemented with distinct sections at minimum: Hero, About, Services (Web Solutions), Projects/Case Studies, Skills/Tech Stack, Contact, Footer.
A top navigation allows jumping to each section (anchors or equivalent) and works on mobile via a collapsed menu.
Layout is fully responsive across common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop) without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.text: Implement a site-wide background color matching the user-provided background color, applied consistently across all sections and components.
acceptanceCriteria: The primary page background uses the user-provided color consistently (no mismatched page/section backgrounds unless intentionally layered with transparent surfaces).
Text and UI surfaces maintain accessible contrast against the chosen background (e.g., readable headings/body text and visible focus states).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme (colors beyond the background, typography, spacing, component styling) with a distinct modern style, used consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme is evident across headings, buttons, cards, and forms (typography scale, spacing, borders/radii, shadows).
Interactive elements include clear hover/active/focus states and keyboard navigability for primary actions and navigation.

requirements.text: Add a Projects/Case Studies section with reusable project cards that display: project title, short description, tech stack tags, and optional external links (e.g., live demo / repository).
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 sample project cards render from a structured data list (not hardcoded repeated JSX).
Each card supports optional links and renders gracefully when a link is missing.

requirements.text: Add a Contact section with a client-side validated contact form (name, email, message) that provides clear success/error UI without relying on external email services.
acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields and email format before submission.
Submitting shows a visible success state (e.g., inline confirmation) and a failure state (e.g., inline error) without integrating any external email provider.
No secrets/API keys are required for the contact experience.

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (page title, description, favicon, Open Graph defaults) using English user-facing text.
acceptanceCriteria: Document title and meta description are set to match the portfolio branding.
A favicon is present and referenced in the app.
Open Graph metadata is present with reasonable defaults (title/description/image).

requirements.text: Generate and include minimal custom static imagery for the portfolio (hero/brand visuals) and render them from frontend static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated` and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Images render correctly in the Hero and/or branding areas without being fetched from the backend.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose those UI components instead).
Do not modify any paths listed as immutable in the system context (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, Internet Identity hooks).
Keep the solution within a single Internet Computer backend actor if backend work becomes necessary later.
nonGoals: No third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported, and it is not required for this portfolio).
No external database or third-party CMS integration.
No email delivery integration (e.g., SendGrid/SMTP) for the contact form.

required: Abstract geometric hero background illustration in a modern tech style (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Minimal monogram logo mark, high contrast, flat design (logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
Three project thumbnail illustrations with consistent style and simple shapes (project-thumb-1.dim_1200x800.png)
Three project thumbnail illustrations with consistent style and simple shapes (project-thumb-2.dim_1200x800.png)
Three project thumbnail illustrations with consistent style and simple shapes (project-thumb-3.dim_1200x800.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
